content:
Aadima sahadaa sthephaanos-perunnaallil chertthinnenne
Than mahimaavaal kartthaave!- nyaanum raajyam nedaname.
Kalleravanelkkunneram- praarththhikkunnathu kandappoll
Sahadaa than pangkappaadil doothanmaar vismayamaandu.
Yoodanmaar krooshikkumpoll- drshdi uyartthi praarththhicha
Naathhanodee bhakthavarenyan- saadrshyam praapikkunnu.
Yeshuvine pithrvalabhaage- kandaan, than bhakthanmaare
Maanicheedum sarvveshaa!- sthothram, melum dhaathriyilum.
